Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller.ClientController
public class ClientController extends Object
This is the client controller, it runs the main client's finite state machine.
Author:
Riccardo Milici, Riccardo Motta, Matteo Negro

      Returns true if this client has got the communication-enable token.
      Returns:
      The active status associated with the username of this client, saved into the game model.

    • sendCommandsToServer

      private void sendCommandsToServer(List<com.google.gson.JsonObject> messages) throws IllegalActionException, InterruptedException, IllegalMoveException
      Checks the messages and sends them to the server.
      Parameters:
      messages - The messages to send.
      Throws:
      IllegalActionException - Thrown if a message doesn't pass the check.
      InterruptedException - Thrown if a thread interruption occurs.
      IllegalMoveException

    • checkOccurrences

      private void checkOccurrences(com.google.gson.JsonObject message) throws IllegalMoveException
      This method is a helper for 'manageGameRunning', check occurrences in specialCharacter.
      Parameters:
      message - The message has to be checked.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - Thrown if the client model is not aligned with that of the game server.

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
